speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: If you shall chance, Camillo, to visit Bohemia

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: on the like occasion whereon my services

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: are now on foot, you shall see, as I have said, great

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: difference betwixt our Bohemia and your Sicilia.

speaker: CAMILLO
text: I think this coming summer the King of

speaker: CAMILLO
text: Sicilia means to pay Bohemia the visitation which

speaker: CAMILLO
text: he justly owes him.

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: Wherein our entertainment shall shame

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: us; we will be justified in our loves. For indeed—

speaker: CAMILLO
text: Beseech you—

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: Verily, I speak it in the freedom of my

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: knowledge. We cannot with such magnificence—in

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: so rare—I know not what to say. We will give you

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: sleepy drinks, that your senses, unintelligent of our

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: insufficience, may, though they cannot praise us, as

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: little accuse us.

speaker: CAMILLO
text: You pay a great deal too dear for what’s given

speaker: CAMILLO
text: freely.

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: Believe me, I speak as my understanding

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: instructs me and as mine honesty puts it to

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: utterance.

speaker: CAMILLO
text: Sicilia cannot show himself over-kind to Bohemia.

speaker: CAMILLO
text: They were trained together in their childhoods,

speaker: CAMILLO
text: and there rooted betwixt them then such an

speaker: CAMILLO
text: affection which cannot choose but branch now.

speaker: CAMILLO
text: Since their more mature dignities and royal necessities

speaker: CAMILLO
text: made separation of their society, their encounters,

speaker: CAMILLO
text: though not personal, hath been royally

speaker: CAMILLO
text: attorneyed with interchange of gifts, letters, loving

speaker: CAMILLO
text: embassies, that they have seemed to be together

speaker: CAMILLO
text: though absent, shook hands as over a vast, and

speaker: CAMILLO
text: embraced as it were from the ends of opposed

speaker: CAMILLO
text: winds. The heavens continue their loves.

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: I think there is not in the world either

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: malice or matter to alter it. You have an unspeakable

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: comfort of your young Prince Mamillius. It is a

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: gentleman of the greatest promise that ever came

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: into my note.

speaker: CAMILLO
text: I very well agree with you in the hopes of

speaker: CAMILLO
text: him. It is a gallant child—one that indeed physics

speaker: CAMILLO
text: the subject, makes old hearts fresh. They that went

speaker: CAMILLO
text: on crutches ere he was born desire yet their life to

speaker: CAMILLO
text: see him a man.

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: Would they else be content to die?

speaker: CAMILLO
text: Yes, if there were no other excuse why they

speaker: CAMILLO
text: should desire to live.

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: If the King had no son, they would desire

speaker: ARCHIDAMUS
text: to live on crutches till he had one.
